name: DarkSprites
description:
Hello, everyone, this is Harry.

This  game is inspired by I Wanna series and Darksouls.(although it doesn't connect to them lol)

It is a platform game but has not finished yet, with only one boss and one enemy. Still in development.

But you can still have fun with you friend or yourself, for your consideration, I have lower the difficulty, try to defeat my first boss! 

It has story though, you are an adventure who is going to another land to discover species,

Features:

  • Local multiplayer (2-player)
  • Co-op
  • Difficult
  • Fun

More Information:

Release date: Next Generation

Platform: PC

Price: Free
